challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Before CloudGlance, a global leader in industrial automation was struggling. Their manual review process for complex RFPs was slow and prone to error, forcing them to "no-bid" valuable opportunities simply due to a lack of bandwidth.

painPoints.text: Manual review taking 3-4 weeks per RFP
Missing key requirements in 200+ page documents
No-bidding 60% of opportunities due to bandwidth
Teams working in silos with no visibility

quote.text: We were leaving money on the table. Our team was overwhelmed, and we knew we were missing opportunities, but we didn't have the bandwidth to pursue them all.
quote.author: VP of Business Development

transformation.title: The Transformation
transformation.description: After adopting our platform, they began processing 5x more proposals in the first quarter alone. Our Go/No-Go analysis helped them instantly qualify the right opportunities, and the auto-drafting feature enabled their team to create higher-quality bids in a fraction of the time.
